section1.title: Who am I?
section1.paragraph1: I graduated from Limerick School of Art and Design in 2015, spent a year in New York and have spent the last while catching up with everyone in Dublin.
section1.paragrah2: I’m passionate about creating intuitive experiences through sleek interfaces and delightful interactions. My process focuses heavily on investigating user needs and delivering a product or service that matches or exceeds these needs.

section2.paragraph1: I’m trying my damndest to stand up on a surf board…and turn. Mostly the standing up part though, it’s hard! I also play tennis and tag rugby—but I’ll really play any kind of sport depending on my surroundings! I’m a big fan of food...so you’ll usually find me devouring a steak or heaping some cheese onto a cracker.
